forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. South southwest wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 3 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the city stirs beneath a quilt of clouds, layered and whispering of warmth while the chill still lingers. The temperature hovers comfortably close to 50 degrees, a gentle reminder to bundle up just a bit against the coolness in the air. The forecast promises an uplifting embrace of sunshine as the day unfolds, with highs reaching toward a modest 64 before the afternoon beckons a slight retreat to around 62. The soft south-southwest breeze unfurls at a casual pace, more a companion than a distraction as it dances through the streets.

With an eye toward the horizon, expect clarity to emerge as the morning dew evaporates, revealing the city’s signature landmarks, though the marine layer might still flirt at the fringes of the bay. This teasing presence of fog—feathery and translucent—paints the shoreline and whispers stories of the coast. As the day matures, local residents and visitors alike will find joy in slipping into light layers—perhaps a cardigan or a stylish windbreaker—perfect for those leisurely strolls through the park or a quiet breakfast on an outdoor patio, where the softhearted sun begins to work its magic, urging the world awake. A gentle day beckons, inviting a cadence of simple pleasures and spontaneous discoveries in the heart of San Francisco.
